NORTH ATLANTIC.
ICELAND.
DNC 19.
1. CABLE OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER
   NOTICE BY M/V LAYLA IN VICINITY OF TRACKLINE
   JOINING
   62-54N 23-18W, 62-50N 23-18W,
   62-45N 25-26W, 62-30N 25-26W,
   62-12N 29-47W, 62-00N 29-41W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1952/18.
